title: JavaScript Sucks
summary: To start off my new blog, code-sucks, let's start off with some code that sucks! JavaScript is a quirky languaget that has a lot suck-ish aspects. Here I'll explore some of the bad parts of JavaScript.

title: Why Prime Numbers Are Awesome
summary: Prime numbers are very special numbers in both mathematics and computer science, both in theory and in application. Here I'll go over a subset of the awesome aspects of prime numbers.
